item.description: GitOps sounds too good to be true. The idea of syncing the state of your systems and applications from a single source of truth in Git feels so natural and intuitive. GitOps offers many advantages, like having a versioned track record of your application. However, as great as this sounds, it’s only part of the picture. In this article, Iâ€™ll take you on my journey to discover the missing piece in GitOps and explore a tool that might fill the gap: Kargo.
